entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
